title: Noguchi, a sculptor's world
brief_description: A film biography of Isamu Noguchi, a foremost modern twentieth century artist, whom Buckminster Fuller called “The comprehensive artist without peer in our time”. Speaking directly to his audience and narrating the film, Noguchi lends insight into his thinking, philosophy and versatile creative life.
